safe.title: 100% Safe

about.title: About McFun
about.subtitle: The simplest and safest way to launch tokens on Ethereum with built-in liquidity and unruggable security.

step1.title: 1. Token Creation
step1.description: When you launch a token on McFun, we deploy a new ERC-20 token contract with a fixed supply of 1,000,000 tokens. You choose the token name, symbol, and what percentage of the supply to allocate to the initial liquidity pool (minimum 50%).

step2.title: 2. Automatic Liquidity Pool
step2.description: Immediately after token creation, an Automated Market Maker (AMM) liquidity pool is created. You deposit ETH (minimum 0.1 ETH) alongside your allocated tokens to form the initial liquidity. Trading is enabled instantly using the constant product formula (x * y = k), similar to Uniswap V2.

step3.title: 3. Liquidity Burning
step3.description: The liquidity pool tokens (LP tokens) that represent ownership of the pool are permanently burned by sending them to the zero address. This burns your deposited ETH and tokens in the pool forever, making your token unruggable - no one can ever remove the initial liquidity, not even you.

step4.title: 4. Trading Begins
step4.description: Your token is immediately tradable on our platform. Every swap incurs a 0.4% fee that goes to the platform to maintain and improve the service. The remaining tokens (not allocated to liquidity) are sent directly to your wallet.

visibility.title: Token Visibility & Discovery
visibility.description: Every token launched through McFun receives permanent visibility on our platform, giving your project lasting exposure to potential traders and investors.

ranking.title: Automatic Listing & Ranking
ranking.description: All tokens are automatically listed on the Popular Tokens page and ranked by market cap. The higher your token's market cap, the higher it ranks, giving successful projects maximum visibility.

unruggable.title: Truly Unruggable
unruggable.description: Initial liquidity is permanently burned. No one can remove it, making rug pulls impossible.

fair.title: No Presales or Insider Advantages
fair.description: Everyone trades at the same price from the AMM. Fair launch for all participants.

simple.title: Simple & Straightforward
simple.description: No complex parameters or DeFi knowledge required. Launch in seconds.

lowBarrier.title: Low Barrier to Entry
lowBarrier.description: Only 0.1 ETH minimum liquidity required. No platform fees to launch.

instant.title: Instant Liquidity
instant.description: Your token is tradable immediately with built-in AMM functionality.

transparent.title: Transparent & On-Chain
transparent.description: All contracts are verifiable on Etherscan. No hidden mechanisms.

launch.title: Token Launch Fees
launch.description: That's right - there are no token creation fees to launch your token. You only pay Ethereum network gas fees.

locking.title: Token Locking Fees
locking.description: Lock any ERC-20 token for any duration completely free. You only pay Ethereum network gas fees.

trading.title: Trading Fees
trading.description: Every token swap on our platform incurs a 0.4% fee. This fee goes to the platform to support infrastructure, development, and ongoing improvements.

burned.title: Permanently Burned Liquidity
burned.description: LP tokens are sent to the zero address (0x000...000) immediately upon creation. This is verifiable on-chain and cannot be undone.

immutable.title: Immutable Contracts
immutable.description: Once deployed, token and AMM contracts cannot be modified, upgraded, or paused. What you see is what you get.

transparent.title: Transparent Fee Recipient
transparent.description: The platform fee recipient address is hardcoded in the contract and publicly visible. No hidden fee switches or backdoors.

opensource.title: Open Source & Verifiable
opensource.description: All smart contracts can be viewed and verified on Etherscan. Audit the code yourself before using the platform.

about.founder: McFun was founded and is maintained by Jamie McNeill.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.connectWalletDescription: Connect your wallet to view your portfolio
portfolio.infoMessage: This page tracks your ETH balance and tokens that are traded on McFun.

aboutPage.trackHoldingsDescription: The Portfolio page makes it effortless to monitor the value of all your McFun token holdings in one place. Simply connect your wallet to see real-time values of your ETH balance and all tokens you own that are traded on McFun.
aboutPage.realtimeTrackingDescription: View your total portfolio value, individual token balances, current prices, and the USD value of each position. Everything updates automatically so you always know exactly what your holdings are worth.
aboutPage.tokenLockingDescription: McFun provides a secure, trustless token locking service that's completely free to use. Lock any ERC20 token for any duration to demonstrate commitment, build trust with your community, or create vesting schedules.
aboutPage.lockAnyTokenDescription: Lock tokens from any project - whether they're McFun tokens or any other ERC20 token on Ethereum. Set your own lock duration from days to years.
aboutPage.completlyFreeDescription: Unlike other locking services that charge platform fees, McFun's token locker is completely free. You only pay network gas fees - no hidden costs or service charges.
aboutPage.proveTrustDescription: Locking tokens demonstrates long-term commitment to a project. All locks are publicly visible and verifiable on-chain, providing transparency and building confidence in your community.
aboutPage.disclaimerImportant: IMPORTANT: Trading cryptocurrencies and tokens carries substantial risk. By using this platform, you acknowledge and accept the following:
aboutPage.riskOfLossDescription: Cryptocurrency trading is extremely volatile and speculative. You may lose some or all of your investment. Only invest what you can afford to lose completely.
aboutPage.noGuaranteesDescription: Past performance does not guarantee future results. Token prices can fluctuate dramatically and unpredictably.
aboutPage.noFinancialAdviceDescription: Nothing on this platform constitutes financial, investment, legal, or tax advice. Always conduct your own research and consult with qualified professionals before making investment decisions.
aboutPage.smartContractRisksDescription: While our contracts are designed to be secure and immutable, smart contracts may contain bugs or vulnerabilities. Use at your own risk.
aboutPage.noResponsibilityDescription: The platform operator, developers, and contributors accept no responsibility or liability for any losses, damages, or adverse outcomes resulting from your use of this platform, including but not limited to trading losses, smart contract failures, network issues, or any other technical problems.
aboutPage.regulatoryUncertaintyDescription: Cryptocurrency regulations vary by jurisdiction and may change. You are responsible for ensuring your use of this platform complies with all applicable laws in your jurisdiction.
aboutPage.noRecourseDescription: Blockchain transactions are irreversible. Once a transaction is confirmed, it cannot be undone. Double-check all transaction details before confirming.
aboutPage.platformAvailabilityDescription: The platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted access or error-free operation.
aboutPage.acknowledgement: By using this platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms. You accept full responsibility for your trading decisions and their outcomes.

wallet.byConnecting: By connecting your wallet, you agree to our Terms of Service
